volunteer-dashboard.Оформи членство Гудсёрфинга и открой для: Sign up for a Goodsurfing membership and discover the endless world of meaningful travel!

volunteer-gallery.Добавьте несколько ваших фотографий, кот: Add some of your photos that will help others understand you better. For example, photos of where you've been, examples of how you successfully tackled tasks, or your meetings with other surfers.
volunteer-gallery.Добавьте одно или несколько видео через: Add one or more videos via URL (e.g., from YouTube, VK, Vimeo). In the video(s), tell us about yourself, your skills and experience, and your motivation to travel with purpose. You can include multiple videos.
volunteer-gallery.Сюда вы можете добавить ваши дипломы и с: Here you can add your diplomas and certificates that confirm your experience and skills.
volunteer-gallery.Произошла ошибка при загрузке изображени: An error occurred while uploading the image
volunteer-gallery.Вы ещё не добавили ни одного видео: You haven't added any videos yet
volunteer-gallery.Произошла ошибка с обновлением галереи: An error occurred while updating the gallery
volunteer-gallery.Галерея успешно обновлена: The gallery has been successfully updated
volunteer-gallery.Диплом или сертификат были успешно добав: The diploma or certificate has been successfully added

volunteer-create-article.Оптимальные размеры 2175 х 966. Вес не б: Optimal size 2175 x 966. Weight no more than 2MB
volunteer-create-article.Описание статьи должно достигать как мин: Article description must be at least 200 characters
volunteer-create-article.Описание статьи может достигать не больш: Article description can be no more than 30000 characters

personalVolunteer.Произошла ошибка или пользователь не зар: An error occurred or the user is not registered as a volunteer
personalVolunteer.Волонтёр не указал информацию о себе: The volunteer has not provided any information about themselves
personalVolunteer.Волонтёр не указал умения: The volunteer has not listed any skills
personalVolunteer.Волонтёр не указал дополнительные умения: The volunteer has not listed any additional skills
personalVolunteer.У волонтера пока нет вакансий в которых: The volunteer has not participated in any vacancies yet
personalVolunteer.Информация о пользователе ограничена, та: User information is limited because they are not a volunteer
